s: 4 days ago - It is operated by Kick Streaming Pty Ltd and backed by Stake.com co-founders Bijan Tehrani, Ed Craven, and streaming personality Trainwreckstv. t: Kick is “burning money” paying for Twitch’s streaming service from Amazon - Dexerto
s: April 14, 2023 - Kick is positioned as a rival to Twitch, but as it turns out, they are paying to use Amazon’s technology used by Twitch itself.
